法規內容.條文內容: The Standards are stipulated in accordance with Paragraph 1, Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.
Admission prices to the exhibition galleries of the National Museum of Prehistory (“Museum”) are as shown in Table 1, attached.
Admission prices of the Gallery of Discovery of NMP are shown in Table 1-1.

As its operations permit, the Museum shall provide its venues for use by foreign and domestic public and private organizations or individuals for the holding of non-profit or social educational events that conform with the operational objectives of the Museum. The fee-charging standards for the use of venues are as shown in Table 2, attached.
The fee-charging standards for the use of the Museum’s pianos are as shown in Table 3, attached.
The fee-charging standards for the use of the Museum’s image materials and photocopying charges are as shown in Table 4, attached.
The admission prices to the exhibition hall of the Museum’s Peinan Site Park are as shown in Table 5, attached.
The admission prices to the exhibition galleries of the Museum of Archaeology, Tainan Branch of National Museum of Prehistory are as shown in Table 5-1, attached.
The venue and facility management fees for the Museum’s Peinan Site Park are as shown in Table 6, attached.
The venue and facility management fees for the Museum of Archaeology, Tainan Branch of National Museum of Prehistory are as shown in Table 6-1, attached.
The museum-issued Family Card discount ticket prices are as shown in Table 7, attached.

The fee-charging standards prescribed here shall be reviewed at least once every three years to take into consideration various factors, such as prices of commodities and changes in market prices or costs.
These Standards shall take effect immediately upon promulgation.
